item.title: ViewQwest introduces new 2Gbps fiber broadband services
item.description: Source: ViewQwest website. ViewQwest, a high-end internet provider in Singapore, has launched its 2Gbps fiber broadband service. ViewQwest’s CEO, Vignesa Moorthy, stated that the company recognizes the increasing demand for faster internet speeds as people use their home networks for data-intensive activities like streaming and working remotely. He emphasized the company’s commitment to delivering the fastest residential internet speeds globally and highlighted the easy setup process of their new 2Gbps service.
